Meteara: The so-called energon is our creation, as well as this whole 
Vector. It is the life of this planet. Do you understand more now?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Kup::
> 
> He had been silent about this encounter at first, but now 
transformed to bot mode.
> 
> "Ok, lets all just cool down here."
> 
> Kup looks right at the Vok.
> 
> "Vok, eh? I think i heard about you after Primal's crew returned. So 
your are here for the uniqe energon as well? Dont take this the wrong 
way, but what's it to you?"
